overview: Bantams are well known to be fierce little fuckers aint they?  Especially the cocks – in the boxing ring and in the world of our feathered friends!  But this lot certainly ain't Bantam sized!  In fact they've all got prize winning cocks on display and you definitely wont be disappointed with this triple-pack, 3-films in-one Triga ‘Cockbuster!  It features some of our best lads – a Billy Essex wank-athon with that dirty little fucker Manc Sniper and the inked-up hardman Millwall Lad givin' it his best shot!!  Get it now, while it's still hot!
title: Bantam Cocks
